body:
Hi ! As the title says, I will be hosting a minecraft realms server here within the next few days, and I would like to invite some of you avicus players to it.

If you are interested in coming, please add me on Skype.


Skype: Jacob.sandobal


I can only invite 20 people, so it's on a first-come, first-serve basis.

title: Hosting a Realms server !
